short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Review and rate your favourite movie, tv show or game and connect with friends of the same personal interest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blewe aims to provide a bona fide blend between social networking and a review platform of entertainment.

You will be able to review and rate your favourite movie, tv show or game whilst being able to connect with friends of the same personal interest or choice of entertainment.
